title: EPISTOLAE Kenneth Godfrey
html:
EPISTOLAE Kenneth Godfrey

Since two recent issues of VERBATIM have contained lists of unusual names, perhaps you would be willing to add my collection:

{{< column >}} {{}} Belle Gravey Hellfat {{}} {{}} Seneca M. Gamble {{}} {{}} Sleeth Heffelfinger Wilkie {{}} {{}} Melborne Moose {{}} {{}} Marcy Tinkle {{}} {{}} Slaughter Linthicum {{}} {{}} Herome L. Opie {{}} {{}} Urban Shirk {{}} {{}} Oscar A. Doob {{}} {{}} Ardella Sweek {{}} {{}} Laurie Doughty Dorr {{}} {{}} Delight Diefenderfer {{}} {{}} Griffin M. Lovelace {{}} {{}} J. Hayden Twiss {{}} {{}} Ovid Fiveash {{}} {{}} Senta Hella Poock {{}} {{}} Hyacinth Ringrose {{}} {{}} Ingo A. Esch {{}} {{}} H. Milton Flitcraft {{}} {{}} J. Blan Van Urk {{}} {{}} Burton Bunch {{}} {{}} Alphabet John Duntz {{}} {{}} Leat Woolheater {{}} {{}} Iduma Self {{}} {{< /column >}}

Luther Orange Lemon, who was on Ms. Brown's list [VERBATIM II, 2], was also on mine, because he was a man I knew in business. [Kenneth Godfrey, Orient, New York]

Here are a few from our collection:

{{< column >}} {{}} Lois Achue {{}} {{}} Ted Bear {{}} {{}} Norma Tweedle Ballew {{}} {{}} Harold Belcher {{}} {{}} Basil Bibby {{}} {{}} Clement Bourgeois, Jr. {{}} {{}} Avis Crowe {{}} {{}} Dr. Paul Cutright {{}} {{}} Ormly Gumfudgin {{}} {{}} Mildred B. Dey {{}} {{}} A. Tilden Cree {{}} {{}} Anthony Albino {{}} {{}} Ann Tilley {{}} {{}} Kelly Green {{}} {{}} Editor [LU]
